snippet: The convicted drug lord Joaquín Guzmán Loera, who twice escaped from jail, was transferred to a prison in northern Mexico near the border with Texas.
abstract: Mexican officials move convicted drug trafficker Joaquin Guzman Loera, known as El Chapo, to prison located near border with Texas.
lead_paragraph: The convicted drug lord Joaquín Guzmán Loera, who twice escaped from jail, was transferred to a prison in northern Mexico near the border with Texas.

headline.main: Mexico Moves Drug Lord Known as El Chapo to Prison Near Texas
headline.print_headline: Mexico Moves Drug Lord to Prison Near Texas City
